name: Buzzy Plugin: Example contact form
description:
Buzzy lets you build working apps straight from Figma.


This is an example contact form design (with results lists and edit views) that has been marked up with the Buzzy Figma plugin.


Grab this file, install the plugin and hit publish - hey presto, you have a working app in a browser. Use this file as a reference for creating your own live forms using Buzzy, straight from Figma.


New to Buzzy? Try the 'Getting Started' guides
